titles.title: Protect Our Disabled Heroes Act of 2019
Protect Our Disabled Heroes Act of 2019
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reinstate criminal penalties for persons charging veterans unauthorized fees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Protect Our Disabled Heroes Act of 2019
This bill imposes criminal penalties and/or fines on individuals for the commission or attempted commission of certain acts in connection with the representation of a veteran who is seeking Department of Veterans Affairs benefits or filing a claim for such benefits.
